title: Russia
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,065 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 940L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and Y
description: Russia is a fascinating country. Its land varies from frozen tundra to lush forests and grasslands, and its culture is rooted in a long history. Students will be excited to learn more with this book.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
